steps.title: Application's details
steps.content: On this page you will see application's details and you will be able to modify some basic informations about it.

steps.title: Create and update an application's topology
steps.content: Here you can see and edit your application's topology by adding, removing and linking components (nodes).

steps.title: Visualize the application's lifecycle workflow
steps.content: Here you can visualize the global deployment workflow of your topology and see details about your components.

steps.title: Configure and deploy your topology
steps.content: Here you will be able to configure and associate your application's components to real cloud resources. You will then be able to deploy your application.

steps.title: Visualize the deployment's status
steps.content: After deployment, this view synthesizes the topology view and add informations on the deployment on the cloud. An event list will deplay details in real time about your services.

steps.title: Manage application's rights
steps.content: You will manage permissions for users and groups on your application.
